<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>35433</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
    <entry>merli/3534</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3534</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3534</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">AEMCAT</string>
            <string language="en">AEMCAT</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">AEMCAT</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">AEMCAT</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">AEMCAT</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">AEMCAT</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">AEMCAT</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Portal de l'Associació d'Ensenyants de Música de Catalunya. Presenta un butlletí de notícies, una relació de novetats editorials i enllaços a un xat i a un bloc de l'Associació.</string>
            <string language="en">Website of the Association of Music Teachers in Catalonia with a newsletter, the latest on books and magazines, and links to a chat and a restricted area for members.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">música</string>
            <string language="en">music</string>
            <string language="es">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació musical</string>
            <string language="en">music education</string>
            <string language="es">educación musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Web site der Verbindung der Musik-Lehrer in 
Katalonien mit einem Rundschreiben, das späteste auf Büchern und 
Zeitschriften und Links zu einem Schwätzchen und ein eingeschränkter
Bereich für Bauteile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Site Web de l'association des professeurs de 
musique en Catalogne avec un bulletin, le plus en retard sur des 
livres et des magasins, et liens à une causerie et une zone 
restreinte pour des membres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web site da associação de professores da 
música em Catalonia com um boletim de notícias, o mais atrasado em 
livros e em compartimentos, e ligações a um bate-papo e uma área 
interditado para membros.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web site dell'associazione degli insegnanti di 
musica in Catalogna con un bollettino, il più ritardato sui libri e 
sugli scomparti e collegamenti ad una chiacchierata e una zona 
limitata per i membri.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστοχώρος της ένωσης των δασκάλων μουσικής στην 
Καταλωνία με ένα ενημερωτικό δελτίο, ο πιό πρόσφατος στα βιβλία
και τα περιοδικά, και συνδέσεις με μια συνομιλία και μια 
περιορισμένη περιοχή για τα μέλη.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
